name: Terminal squad: Swarmites
description:
Terminal squad: swarmites is a game with indirect control where you must erect a chain of buildings, which generate resources for construction or the combat units for destruction of an enemy. The key to the victory is a smart sequence of actions and keeping of a balance between the erection of combat, defensive and manufacturing facilities.

Game features:


  • A base as a single entity
  • Fight against an infinite flow of enemies through erection of a chain of buildings
  • Random level modifiers strengthen your enemy
  • Use the skills and the explorations in the proper moment in order to gain a tactical superiority
  • Adjust an energy flow to the buildings through their connection and disconnection in order to increase or decrease the rate of production or defence at a certain part of chain.
